OOC: I would like to start off by saying, life sucks.  AOL hasn't 
delivered any posts since Thursday.  I am trying to keep up on the 
site, but it's difficult.  I'll do it as best I can.  I also, just, 
just found out that I'll be going away for the weekend.  If someone 
could keep my characters alive for the weekend, I'd be much obliged.  
Except for Dragoon.  I'll work that out when I get back.

::Ender::
    He walks up to the conference room.  "I got the message, and I 
came as fast as I could.  Of course, I don't think I've met any of 
you."  He bows deeply.  "I am Ender, tactician extrodinaire."
